title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: SDT-Based Intelligent Tutoring Systems for Student-Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously plan and execute weekly learning plans at least three times per week through an SDT-based ITS (Intelligent Tutoring System).
Learners achieve over a 20% improvement in language learning achievement within three months by utilizing the ITS's personalized feedback system.
Learners maintain over 80% of academic engagement with peer learners through online discussions and collaborative activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
